projects.name: Tezos
projects.description: A blockchain platform that allows users to send and receive tokens, create smart contracts, and participate in governance.

projects.name: KaSa
projects.description: A static analyser for Kappa models. It is written in functional programming language OCaml

projects.name: Rainbow
projects.description: A termination certificate verifier. It is an OCaml program, extracted from the program written in the proof assistant Coq

projects.name: CoLoR
projects.description: A Coq library on rewriting theory and termination. It is written in the proof assistant Coq
